default.shortDescription: Evercom helps any company to monitor, analyze and manage all the comprehensive and varying communications media types available on Microsoft Teams.
featuredParagraphs:
Founded in 1984 in Brussels, the heart of Europe, Evercomdevelops & distributes telecommunication solutions SW for all marketsegments. We work in partnership with all the major integrators to be able todeliver adequate solutions to companies.

Evercom delivers its applications in any business model(license, SaaS, perpetual, subscription) to enable its customers to choose thebest model that fits their needs.

callToAction.title: Request a demo to see how easy it is to get relevant answers about your Teams environment usage.
callToAction.description: Do not hesitate to contact us for more information about our solution, fill out the contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
